@graph.name: CSV to Excel Converter
@graph.description: Free online tool to convert CSV files to Excel format (XLSX). Secure, fast, and reliable - all processing happens locally in your browser.

mainEntity.name: Is my data safe when using this CSV converter?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, absolutely. All file processing happens locally in your browser. Your CSV data never leaves your computer and is never uploaded to any server.

mainEntity.name: Why does Excel show wrong characters in my CSV file?

acceptedAnswer.text: This is usually an encoding issue. CSV files are often saved in UTF-8 format, but Excel expects a different encoding. Our converter handles this automatically by creating a properly formatted XLSX file.

mainEntity.name: Is this CSV to Excel converter free?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our basic converter is completely free with no registration required. Convert your CSV files to Excel format instantly.

mainEntity.name: What is the maximum file size I can convert?

acceptedAnswer.text: Since processing happens in your browser, the limit depends on your device's memory. Typically, files up to 100MB work well on modern devices.

@graph.name: How to Convert CSV to Excel
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to convert CSV files to Excel format online

step.name: Upload CSV File
step.text: Click the upload button or drag and drop your CSV file into the converter

step.name: Preview Data
step.text: Review the first 10 rows of your data in the preview to ensure correct parsing

step.name: Download Excel File
step.text: Click download to save your converted XLSX file
